title: 3 and Out -  Draft Rounds 2 + 3 Reaction
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  Draft Rounds 2 + 3 Reaction
description:
John reacts to the second and third rounds from Friday night, including Malik Willis and other players still on the board still heading into round 4, his favorite day 2 picks, and what teams are facing the most pressure.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
